name: test_e2e_with_logs[095_SQLI_STACK_007]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `SQLI_STACK_007` |
| **Name** | Web shell creation |
| **Category** | SQLI |
| **Subcategory** | stacked_query |
| **Severity** | `HIGH` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `'; SELECT INTO OUTFILE '/var/www/html/shell.php' 'PHP_SHELL_CODE'; --`
- **Encoded**: `%27%3B%20SELECT%20INTO%20OUTFILE%20%27%2Fvar%2Fwww%2Fhtml%2Fshell.php%27%20%27PHP_SHELL_CODE%27%3B%20--`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~33000ms
- **Timestamp**: 20:37:43.000 UTC

## Rule Mapping

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Expected Rule** | `[NGINX SQLi] Advanced SQL Injection Attempt` |
| **Matched Rule** | `[NGINX SQLi] Advanced SQL Injection Attempt test_id=SQLI_STACK_007-1770842263118-vqi0wc pattern_id=SQLI_STACK_007 uri=/?q=%27%3B%20SELECT%20INTO%20OUTFILE%20%27%2Fvar%2Fwww%2Fhtml%2Fshell.php%27%20%27PHP_SHELL_CODE%27%3B%20-- client=127.0.0.1 method=GET` |
| **Rule Match** | ✅ Match |

## Detection Evidence

**Rule Name**: [NGINX SQLi] Advanced SQL Injection Attempt test_id=SQLI_STACK_007-1770842263118-vqi0wc pattern_id=SQLI_STACK_007 uri=/?q=%27%3B%20SELECT%20INTO%20OUTFILE%20%27%2Fvar%2Fwww%2Fhtml%2Fshell.php%27%20%27PHP_SHELL_CODE%27%3B%20-- client=127.0.0.1 method=GET
